pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, April 8, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Saturday, April 8, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will depart for Lille, France.

Canada Reception Centre (Hangar 11)
Macdonald-Cartier International Airport
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for departure photo opportunity
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:15 a.m.

Lille, France

10:25 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive in Lille and be greeted by Mr. Michel Lalande, Prefect of the Region of Nord-Pas-de-Calais Picardie, and the Honourable Lawrence Cannon, Ambassador of Canada to France.

Lille Airport
Lille, France

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity of the arrival

 

Note: all times local
